<title level="1" right="Spell 5" pfs="Standard">
[Desperate Repair](/Spells.aspx?ID=1112)
<actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 92

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

**Trigger** A shield within range would be reduced to 0 Hit Points by a damaging effect

**Requirements** The triggering shield had more than 1 Hit Points before taking damage
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 60 feet

**Target** 1 shield
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You hold a shield together with the power of your magic, forcing wood and steel to fuse back together. The shield remains at 1 Hit Point and isn't destroyed. Its construction is weakened until someone takes the time to repair it, preventing _desperate repair_ or a similar ability from saving the same shield until your next daily preparations.
name: Desperate Repair
requirement: The triggering shield had more than 1 Hit Points before taking damage
requirement_markdown: The triggering shield had more than 1 Hit Points before taking damage
